title: Hidden gem of a museum
text: This museum tucked across the street from several other museums (inlcuding the Alte Pinakothek) has a fabulous collection.  It does beautiful shows in a bright lit space.  Also the coffee/cafe is worth a visit for a quick pck me up and some sweets

title: great range of modern art and very relaxed atmosphere in December
text: great pieces including a big modern design area. great modernart too including some greats like warhol.'worth a visit

title: Average exhibition
text: I visited this Museum during my stay in Munch. I find the exhibition average that has not nothing special to see.

title: Sunday for a euro every time
text: Great place to visit with large open rooms, with well displayed and appropriate pieces.It was a pleasant couple of hours, even if it was crazy full. Clearly the concept is good and the architecture equivalently suitable. Highly recommended.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Surprisingly good!
text: The building was very attractive, airy, light filled with easy gallery access.  The art was generally quite good, with several top German & foreign artists of the past 100 years represented.  I found it a most enjoyable way to spend a morning,  And it is within short walking distance of the city center.
visitor_origin: Washington DC, District of Columbia, USA

title: Parfois intéressant parfois bof
text: Pour les fans d’art moderne, la Pinakothek est un endroit à visiter. Sans prétention, le musée s’allonge vraiment de son côté design moderne avec notamment des tableaux de l’impressionnisme etc... en y allant en après-midi, en ce moment, il n’y aura pas beaucoup de monde. Entre design, architecture, art des objets et tableaux, on s’y perd un peu.J’ai plus trouvé de l’intérêt pour les tableaux que pour la partie architecture ou design.

title: Verrukkelijk gebouw met prachtige thema’s
text: Wat mij betreft is dit een must-see. Prachtig gebouw van de hand van Stephan Braunfels, waar de oriëntatie zó geweldig is, dat je als bezoeker steeds weet, waar je je bevindt. We hebben heerlijk gezworven langs de diverse deel-tentoonstellingen. Verrassend: een hommage van George Baselitz aan Piet Mondriaan ‘Piet in kürzer Hose’ (zie foto), een fraai buro van de hand van Rietveld, nooit eerder gezien. Ook veel aandacht voor schilderkunst in de donkere periode van WO II. Mooie aandacht voor beeldhouwwerk, oa van Archipenko.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Intéressant
text: Il faut aimer le moderne mais on y trouve des oeuvres très intéressantes sur Picasso, Braque et cie, a voir même si design ne m’a pas intéressé.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beeindruckend
text: Mit jedem Besuch entdecken wir neue Dinge, Eindrücke und Elemente die einem völlig neu erscheinen. Die aktuelle Ausstellung Feelings ist jetzt nicht mein Persönliches Ding , aber in jede Fall sehenswert.

title: Moderne Kunst, Design, Produktdesign im faszinierenden Gebäude.
text: Sowohl moderne Malerei, als auch Skulpturen sowie Produktdesign von Bauhaus bis Gegenwart in einem faszinierenden Museumsgebäude, was für sich schon ein Kunstwerk ist. Im Foyer schwingt ein lang aufgehängtes Pendel, das an das Faukaulsche Pendel in Paris erinnert. auch die Restauration ist nicht "von schlechten Eltern".Fußläufig zum Ägyptischen Museum wird der langweiligste Sonntag Nachmittag mit diesen beiden Museen zum unvergesslichen Erlebnis.

title: Manches etwas provokativ.
text: Nettes Museum, vorallem die Bauhaus Ausstellung.  Es gibt ein paar provokative Bilder wie "Man pissing on Chair".  (Pfui!)  Und ein Paar highlights wie Andy Warhols Portrait von Joseph Beuys.  Ein bischen mehr Dali und Picasso darf es auch mehr geben und Calder und Moor (meine persönliche Lieblinge) habe ich keins gesehen.

title: おもしろい！
text: 現代美術の展示物がたくさんあり、非常に興味深かったです。いろいろな作家の作品があるので、お気に入りがあるでしょう。

title: Pinakotheke
text: Het gebouw is overweldigend, de kunst gaat van zeer bijzonder naar kunst wat je als gewoon kunt ervaren.

title: Reichhaltige Ausfall moderner Kunst und Produktdesign
text: Eine Kunstmuseum auf Weltniveau. Unzählige sehenswerte Themenhäuser, Dauer- und Wechselausstellungen. Dies vielleicht auch der einzige wirkliche Kritikpunkt: Wenn man sich alles ansieht und wieder rausgeht ist man völlig reizüberflutet. Möglicherweise wäre weniger mehr. Zudem fehlten mir bei einigen Exponaten die Erklärung.

title: шикарно!
text: Коллекция промышленного дизайна - одна из лучших из увиденных. замечательно передает дух времени. как же мы сейчас изменились!

title: Sonderausstellung des  'Lichtdesigners Ingo Maurer'
text: Die Sonderausstellung des kürzlich verstorbenen 'Lichtdesigners Ingo Maurer' ist unvorstellbar gut und sollte eigentlich ein 'Muss' für jeden Kunst- und Kulturinteressierten sein ! Schlichtweg sensationell !!

title: Καταπληκτικά έργα τέχνης  σ ένα υπέροχο μουσείο!
text: Ένα μουσείο μοντέρνας τέχνης και design πολύ υψηλού επιπέδου με αριστουργήματα των πιο γνωστών και διάσημων καλλιτεχνών να κοσμούν τις αίθουσες του! Picasso, Miro , Brack, Max Ernst , Kandinsky , Magritte , Bacon και τόσοι άλλοι! Στο ισόγειο εκτιθενται αντικείμενα, έπιπλα, φωτα

title: Average exhibition
text: I visited this Museum during my stay in Munch. I find the exhibition average that has not nothing special to see.

title: Imperdibile
text: Non basta una giornata per visitare questo enorme museo dell'arte moderna. Raccoglie design, fotografia, pittura e scultura. Si possono trovare delle opere di grandi artisti come Picasso, Kandijnski, Klee, Mirò. Io sono andata al pomeriggio e ci ho passato due ore e mezza, ma ne

title: Eines der besten Museen in München

title: Sonderausstellung des  'Lichtdesigners Ingo Maurer'
text: Die Sonderausstellung des kürzlich verstorbenen 'Lichtdesigners Ingo Maurer' ist unvorstellbar gut und sollte eigentlich ein 'Muss' für jeden Kunst- und Kulturinteressierten sein ! Schlichtweg sensationell !!

title: Καταπληκτικά έργα τέχνης  σ ένα υπέροχο μουσείο!
text: Ένα μουσείο μοντέρνας τέχνης και design πολύ υψηλού επιπέδου με αριστουργήματα των πιο γνωστών και διάσημων καλλιτεχνών να κοσμούν τις αίθουσες του! Picasso, Miro , Brack, Max Ernst , Kandinsky , Magritte , Bacon και τόσοι άλλοι! Στο ισόγειο εκτιθενται αντικείμενα, έπιπλα, φωτα ακόμη κι αυτοκίνητα που άλλαξαν ή σημαδεψαν την ιστορία του design παγκοσμιως.Όταν επισκεφθηκαμε με την οικογένεια μου το μουσείο υπήρχε κι η έκθεση συναισθημάτων που ήταν ένας διάλογος μεταξύ του καλλιτέχνη (μέσω του έργου του) και του θεατή! Καταπληκτικό το installation με το ATM και το μωρό στο καλάθι!

title: Average exhibition
text: I visited this Museum during my stay in Munch. I find the exhibition average that has not nothing special to see.

title: Imperdibile
text: Non basta una giornata per visitare questo enorme museo dell'arte moderna. Raccoglie design, fotografia, pittura e scultura.Si possono trovare delle opere di grandi artisti come Picasso, Kandijnski, Klee, Mirò.Io sono andata al pomeriggio e ci ho passato due ore e mezza, ma ne meriterebbe almeno il doppio.La domenica biglietto d'ingresso €1

title: Eines der besten Museen in München
text: Die Pinakothek der Moderne ist immer einen Besuch wert und es gibt viele interessante Ausstellungen. Wer Design, Architektur und moderne Kunst liebt ist hier genau richtig. Am besten am Sonntag kommen, dann kostet der Eintritt nur 1€. Die Garderobe kostet eine Gebühr aber die Locker sind kostenlos (man braucht 2€ um den Locker zu verschließen).

title: a day out
text: this place was amazing every thing behind glass cabinets  a lot to see ans study it was very interesting we all enjoyed the visit

title: Modernia muotoilua ja taidetta
text: Paljon muotoiluun liittyvää, autoja, moottoripyöriä, huonekaluja, kodinkoneita- ja tavaroita sekä astioita. Lisäksi modernia taidetta paljon, mm. Picassoja.

title: Excellent Collection
text: Come especially for the Max Beckmann and enjoy a wide ranging collection of other 20th century artists.

title: Μοντέρνα...
text: Αρχικά θέλαμε να πάμε στην νέα πινακοθήκη αλλά δυστυχώς ήταν κλειστή  Γιατί την φτιάχνουν και έτσι πήγαμε στην μοντέρνα.. Παρόλα αυτά όμως ήταν φανταστική είχε πίνακες από την νέα πινακοθήκη και ήταν φανταστικοί. Μου άρεσε πάρα πολύ ο τομέας με τις μηχανές και τα αυτοκίνητα.

title: Πανέμορφο
text: Εξαιρετική εμπειρία που θέλει χρόνο και κυρίως εναρμόνιση με το περιβάλλον.Πικάσο, Μπρακ, Καντίνσκι, Ντε Κίρικο αλλά και άγνωστοι καλλιτέχνες σε να χώρο γεμάτο χρώματα και ιδέες

title: Excellent Collection
text: Come especially for the Max Beckmann and enjoy a wide ranging collection of other 20th century artists.

text: Αρχικά θέλαμε να πάμε στην νέα πινακοθήκη αλλά δυστυχώς ήταν κλειστή  Γιατί την φτιάχνουν και έτσι πήγαμε στην μοντέρνα.. title: Πανέμορφο
text: Εξαιρετική εμπειρία που θέλει χρόνο και κυρίως εναρμόνιση με το περιβάλλον.Πικάσο, Μπρακ, Καντίνσκι, Ντε Κίρικο αλλά και άγνωστοι καλλιτέχνες σε να χώρο γεμάτο χρώματα και ιδέες

title: Шикарно!
text: Так сложилось, что музеи современного искусства теперь везде входят в нашу обязательную программу. Этот музей шикарный - большой, удобный, не переполненный! Блок дизайна очень интересный!

title: Bringen sie Zeit mit!
text: Jedesmal wieder ein Hammer, auch wenn die Designabteilung langsam mal erneuert werden könnte. Schon der Bau des Museums ist ein Hingucker. Die Ausstellung  waren immer interessant. Meist ist für jeden etwas dabei, vorausgesetzt man mag moderne Kunst. Im Moment besondere sehenswert die Architekturausstellung. Aber bringen Sie genügend Zeit mit. Schade ist einzig, dass die Pinakotheken verkehrsmässig so schlecht erschlossen sind. Ausser dem Tram 27. Und parken ist so gut wie unmöglich imQuartier.

title: A world class collection of art
text: This was the most extraordinary place. I loved it! It is not a good museum; not an excellent museum; it is almost unbelievably magnificent. The building is very new and brilliantly designed to display a truly splendid collection. The staff are very friendly and helpful and it is very quiet. I have not enjoyed a trip to an art gallery so much since going to MoMA in NYC! The Expressionist holdings are worth it without mentioning the Kiefers, the Baselitzes and the Picassos. And there is a lovely cafeteria in a glassed-in terrace. Even the guidebook was extremely worthwhile, and often they are not - too shallow, just good for pictures.  I cannot praise this museum enough! Go and see it.

title: Sicherheitspersonal sehr störend
text: Eigentlich sollte diese Bewertung 4 Sterne erhalten. Aber leider waren hier die anwesenden Mitarbeiter sehr störend. Im Bereich der Bauhausausstellung waren 2 Mitarbeiter im Bereich der Thonet Stühle sich dauernd über alles mögliche unterhaltend. Der gesamte Bereich konnte zuhören und teilhaben. Auch die anderen Mitarbeiter in der Hauptausstellung sind nur mit ihren Handys beschäftigt oder sich lautstark in ihrer Muttersprache zu unterhalten. Dies stört eigentlich nicht aber es war klar erkennbar das auch über den Besucher geredet wurde. Ich kam mir schon wie ein Störenfried vor. Schade, so bin ich schneller aus der Pinakothek gewesen als gedacht.

title: Beeindruckendes Museum
text: Auch wenn man nur wenig Zeit hat, sollte der Besuch in der Pinakothek der Moderne im Besuchsprogramm enthalten sein. Interessante Gebäudearchitektur und schöne  Exponate sorgen für viele Eindrücke.

title: Collection intéressante avec une visite commentée pédagogique bien réalisée
text: Le bâtiment lui-même vaut le détour pour son architecture. Les collections sont intéressantes, avec des pièces de peintres mondialement connus (Picasso, etc.) mais surtout une riche collection de peinture allemande, que l'on voit peu dans les musées de Paris, Londres, New-York ou San Francisco. L'occasion de découvrir les mouvements artistiques contemporains du Bauhaus.

title: Beeindruckende Architektur und faszinierende Kunst
text: Wir waren an einem Sonntag in diesem Museum, dass gut mit dem öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen ist.Am Sonntag kostet der Eintritt nur 1€. Allerdings sollte man beachten, dass man keine großen Taschen in das Museum mitnehmen darf. Hierfür gibt es aber Garderoben und Schließschränke. Leider hatten wir nicht genügend Zeit uns das komplette Museum anzuschauen. Das Museum ist in viele verschiedene Räume mit unterschiedlichen Themen aufgeteilt. Es gibt die unterschiedlichsten Kunstwerke, nicht nur Gemälde. Man kann sich hier definitiv eine Zeit lang beschäftigen. Das einzige, dass ich etwas schade finde, war das die Security sehr unfreundlich ist und das ich keine Kunst von Frauen gefunden habe. Wobei man aber berücksichtigen muss, dass ich nicht in allen Räumen war.

title: Museum with friends
text: A wonderful museum- second time here- beautiful building and a great collection of modern art. They also has a great Café with possibility to sit both inside and out

title: Brede collectie in imposant gebouw.
text: Behalve zeer recente kunst óók aandacht voor leden van Der blaue Reiter en toegepaste kunst zoals meubels.

title: Great modern collection
text: Not a huge collection but a fairly comprehensive overview of 20c German art - all of the pieces well chosen and beautifully displayed.

title: Современно
text: Очень понравился музей! Особенно здание ☺️ его вычурность. Атмосферное кафе. Задела история создания стульев. В воскресенье цена билета- 1 евро, обратите внимание гардероб платный 1 евро.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: echt toll
text: schön gestaltet und mit viel Informationen gespickt. War nicht so überlaufen a diesem Wochenende und so konnte man sich auch mal bei dem ein oder anderen Exponat etwas Zeit zum Verweilen nehmen

title: A feast for contemporary/modern art lovers
text: This is my third visit in a total of 15 yeas.   Each time has been a treat.  A great place if you have limited exposure to modern art and are intrigued to learn more (if you're being dragged along and have no interest, go to the cafe and eat something).   For those with a knowledge of modern art, this place has one of the best collections going.  Clearly there is somewhat of a bias towards German Expressionism, but don't let that stop you, because their collection, as well as changing exhibits, exposes you to an international cast of artists.   What I really enjoy about der Moderne, different from most other modern art museums, is their dedication to form and function as evidenced by a great section of modern industrial design/manufacture, furniture, appliances, etc.

title: Imperdibile
text: Non sono particolarmente appassionato d'arte, però quando mi trovo di fronte a musei del genere, al servizio della cultura e della cittadinanza, non posso che riconoscergli un valore inestimabile. La struttura è la degna cornice di un campionario di opere incredibili. Anche un "non addetto ai lavori" come il sottoscritto non può non trattenere il fiato trovandosi di fronte ad opere di Kandinsky, Klee o De Chirico, giusto per citare alcuni degli artisti più noti esposti in questo museo. Un'ampia area è anche dedicata al design ed è possibile vedere esposti un sacco di oggetti di modernariato che rappresentano gli archetipi di tanti oggetti che abbiamo oggi nelle nostre case. Dulcis in fundo, biglietto per entrare 1€ perché era Domenica.

title: Si  l'on aime l'art moderne !!!!
text: Et si l'on aime l'art moderne c'est un régal. Les salles sont claires et spacieuses, des choses surprenantes à voir, bien sûr on ne va peut-être pas tout aimer mais c'est une merveilleuse découverte.

title: Ihastuttava  museo
text: Museorakennus on valoisa ja avara, hienoa arkkitehtuuria. Nähtävillä on muun muassa Paul Kleen Picasson, René Magritten ja Matissen töitä. Alakerrassa myös designia, autoja huonekaluja, jugend-esineitä. Hieno paikka. Suosittelen.

title: Wunderbares Museum
text: Sehr schön und günstig am Sonntag, nur 1 Euro Eintritt, trotzdem nicht voll. Moderne Malerei der bekanntesten Künstler des 19. Und 20. Jahrhundert, einziger Kritikpunkt. Vollkommen unwissende Museumswärter, Fragen zu einzelnen Bildern oder Räumlichkeiten konnten nicht beantwortet werden.

title: Rude staff. Not worth it.
text: The staff is extremely rude. I got yelled at for not checking in my purse, for leaning in close to read the information next to the art, for stepping within 30 cm of the art. An older staff member came up and yelled directly in my husband’s face, using a threatening stance. My children were handed the audio set and when they asked how to work it, the lady wouldn’t explain anything and told them to figure it out by themselves. A younger staff is required to help with hospitality. Seriously not worth the visit. Had my children not been interested, I would have left immediately. I have been to many museums around the world, not once have I felt unwelcome. Munich Pinakotheks are certainly a waste of time.

title: Pampig byggnad
text: Utformningen av byggnaden med en rundel mitt i och sedan kvadratiska former runt om var spännande arkitektur. Dock påverkade detta cafeet som blev en ödsligt ekande lokal.  Samlingen med modern konst var imponerande i sin omfattning, speciellt Anselm Kiefers verk ger en speciellt upplevelse.

title: Wonderful place to visit
text: First time I've been visiting it was back in 2010 and the second time this summer in 2019. Still amazing how beautiful it was, and happy to see again some of the modern art. Sunday is good for visiting as is just 1 euro entrance but quite busy, of course. A visit should take around 2 hours maximum.

title: A treat!
text: The other positive reviews cover most of the bases, but this was a gem—the downstairs design museum had some of the best & most thought provoking signage I’ve seen. The Joseph Bueys room of stones was remarkable & there were many unexpected treats—a da Chirico self portrait, surprising Da Koonings, great layout & a pleasure to walk around.  And yes, to enjoy this, actually liking modern art is a great start!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Good for some people but not for everyone
text: If you are exited about modern art you can make a nice visit. If you are not very interested of art, I would like you to do something else. I admit that I belong to the first type and the visit was absolutely boring. It was large and sterile with a lot of serious people wandering from room to room without saying a word to anybody.They have however a little nice cafeteria on the ground floor.

title: Très intéressante
text: Le musée réuni la peinture, l’architecture, le graphisme et le design sous un même toit. J’avoue un énorme faible pour la partie consacrée au design notamment sur le mobilier, sans oublier les œuvres de Andy Warhol exposées au 1er étage.Le bon plan venir le dimanche (28 juillet) ou l’entree n’était qu’a 1€.

title: Brilliant modern art museum
text: Fascinating modern art museum in the Museum Quarter of Munich.  Comprehensive collection of modern art from painters such as Picasso, Miro, Kandinsky, Klee, Marc and Macke. Really enjoyable stroll around galleries.  On ground floor a large shiny metal ball is swinging across the floor.Well worth a half day visit especially on a Sunday when admission is only one euro instead of usual 10 euros!Nice cafe on ground floor near entrance

title: 미술관
text: 현대미술을 전시해놓은 곳이다. 일요일의 경우 1유로로 입장할 수 있다. 재미가 없지는 않았으나 다소 난해한 작품들이 많았다.

title: Only got to see the Exterior
text: Unfortunately, the only Pinakothek we saw was the Alte one.  However, we did get to walk past the exterior and see the sculptures in the yard in front.

title: Excellent
text: This museum is one if the best in Munich. It’s very big but also very different. We didn’t like so much the ground floor where there are lots of old furniture. We liked much more the exhibition upstairs with painting. Many important painters as Miro, Krichner, Kandisky.... There

title: Great art
text: Pleasant to walk around. A bit crowded on Sunday as the price is attractive. I a bit small. From outside it looks bigger. 2 hours is enough to see everything.

title: Brilliant!
text: The work of greats like Picasso, Dali, Miro, Klee, and Kandinsky can be seen for 1 euro if you go on a Sunday otherwise you’ll pay 10 euros, but it’s well worth it. There are four areas of art under the one roof here - art, prints and drawings, architecture and design. The 40

title: Immer ein Besuch Wert
text: Einfach Toll, immer ein Besuch Wert, meine Kinder waren begeistert und der Besuch im Shop ist ebenso nennenswert.

title: Only got to see the Exterior
text: Unfortunately, the only Pinakothek we saw was the Alte one.  However, we did get to walk past the exterior and see the sculptures in the yard in front.

title: Excellent
text: This museum is one if the best in Munich. It’s very big but also very different. We didn’t like so much the ground floor where there are lots of old furniture. We liked much more the exhibition upstairs with painting. Many important painters as Miro, Krichner, Kandisky....There is a very nice bookshop and lockers that you need 2 euro. The cafe of the museum looks nice but has no price list around so it is very weird. On Sundays admission is only 1 euro.

title: Great art
text: Pleasant to walk around. A bit crowded on Sunday as the price is attractive. I a bit small. From outside it looks bigger. 2 hours is enough to see everything.

title: Brilliant!
text: The work of greats like Picasso, Dali, Miro, Klee, and Kandinsky can be seen for 1 euro if you go on a Sunday otherwise you’ll pay 10 euros, but it’s well worth it. There are four areas of art under the one roof here - art, prints and drawings, architecture and design. The 40 historical Bauhaus objects currently on show are awesome as are the works of a Belgian painter Raoul De Keyser. You’ll need a couple of hours at least to enjoy this museum of modern art .... and add extra time to enjoy lunch and a drink in the cafe .... reasonably priced and pleasant outdoor surroundings.

title: Immer ein Besuch Wert
text: Einfach Toll, immer ein Besuch Wert, meine Kinder waren begeistert und der Besuch im Shop ist ebenso nennenswert.

title: Really?
text: This has to be one of the craziest displays of “modern” art going around to the point where you have to ask why on earth would they display four paintings of almost the same shade of black? Or someone’s doodle on a page, or something that looks like a coffee stain.  Bizarre.

title: Excellent collection
text: A must-see on any visit to Munich. An architectural masterpiece, this museum has an excellent collection of art from the 19th to the 21st century. Take your time to really enjoy the vast collections.

title: lovely modern art museum
text: if you like modern art...this is the place. a very well designed museum indeed. fantastic cafe and museum shop as well.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: un enchantement!
text: Un véritable incontournable pour tout amateur d'art à Munich!Que ce soit contemporain où plus classique. On y trouve des toiles mais pas que, beaucoup de sculptures et d'objets, la salle regroupant les automobiles est spectaculaire!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Met vrienden op city trip
text: De presentatie van Design als filosofie en als instrument onderstreept het belang ervan. De verbanden tussen de vele producten, zoals auto's - motoren - meubels - apparatuur en meer- is slim en aantrekkelijk vormgegeven

title: Beautiful and stylish museum of modern art
text: The museum is easy to get to by either tram or undergroun.  There are other museums nearby.  The building is great, bright and very stylish. There are good collections of modern art.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Another Munich Masterpiece
text: 19th to 20th century art only, so you are restricted to seeing great art by several of the great “canvas splashers”  such as Picasso, Magritte, Dali, Ernst, Miro, Braque, Monet, Beckmann, Munch and others. This museum is beautifully laid out and spacious. It is also lovely to see young small groups of students mesmerized by the art lovingly described by their teachers and museum staff.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: einfach cool
text: super Museum, allerdings doofe Wärter, eine ist besonders doof, die kenne ich persönlich, aber mei, sie muss halt ihren Job machen

title: Tempi Moderni
text: Giulia Marsano, 18 anni, Liceo Linguistico Rita Levi-Montalcini, Casarano (LE)quest’anno, precisamente il 20 marzo, ho visitato il museo d’arte moderna di monaco durante un viaggio d’istruzione con la mia scuola. Esso è un museo d’arte moderna e contemporanea internazionale. Le opere esposte nella pinacoteca  partono dalla corrente artistica dell’espressionismo fino ad arrivare alle video installazioni dell’arte contemporanea. Questa pinacoteca è situata vicino ad Alte Pinakothek ed entrambe si trovano nel quartiere di Maxvorstadt nel Kunstareal. È accessibile ai disabili e gli orari di aperture sono tutti i giorni, tranne il lunedì, delle 10.00 alle 18.00 e il giovedì dalle 10.00 alle 20.00. L’ingresso costa 10 euro ma la domenica ammonta ad 1 euro. Inoltre le audioguide sono disponibili in tutte le lingue pagando 4,50 euro. Mi è dispiaciuto molto non averla potuta vedere tutta ma purtroppo il tempo che avevamo a disposizione era poco. Sicuramente ci tornerò con calma perché merita davvero tanto.

title: Some parts interesting
text: We had mixed feelings about this museum.  Some parts are quite interesting while other parts did not appeal.  Some of the really modern art did not work for us.  However, still a worthwhile visit overall.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beeindruckend
text: Regentag ist Museumstag, am Sonntag für 1€ , ein Geschenk. Die Beurteilung eines Museums ist eine individuelle, deswegen glaube ich jeder sollte es selbst erleben, wir fanden es gut.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 4 musées en 1 dans un superbe bâtiment
text: Si vous êtes fan d art moderne, des cubistes, des surréalistes dans un écrin très contemporain, ce musée est fait pour vous. 3 autres musées ou plutôt collections enrichissent la partie art moderne autour du design, de graphisme et de l architecture. Le café du musée propose aussi de délicieux en cas.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Museo del moderno
text: Bel museo di arte moderna e design con un ampia sezione dedicata al contemporaneo. Ben disposte tutte le opere e molto bello l'androne con le scale che salgono e scendono ai vari livelli. Facilmente raggiungibile da Karlplatz con poche fermate di tranvia.

title: interessante e con una bella struttura interna
text: Ho trovato questa pinacoteca molto interessante con oggetti d'arte e di design favolosi.Quadri stupendi accanto a opere, per il personale gusto, di scarso spessore.Su e giu' per le scale il museo offre varie prospettive.La domenica si paga il prezzo simbolico di 1 euro.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Quatre collections pour un Musée !
text: Allez-y pour la Nature morte au géranium de Henri Matisse, et les œuvres de Der Blaue Reiter (le cavalier bleu),dont les acteurs principaux sont Wassily Kandinsky, August Macke, Franz Marc et Paul Klee. Superbe !
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Excellent for modern German/European art
text: This art museum has a large and wide-ranging displayed collection of paintings and some sculpture. The abstract German artists of 1920-30's are well represented and explained, plus works by Picasso and American painters. A ticket at 7 euro includes the 3 museums on the block.

title: Sehr interessant
text: Die Pinakothek der Moderne bietet ein sehr breites Spektrum und ist interessant gestaltet. Manche Kunst erklärt sich erst bei längerem betrachten ! Ein bisschen schade ist, daß die Mitarbeiter ab und an gelangweilt an den Wänden lehnen. Trotzdem sehenswert !

title: Amazing building & amazing collection of works.
text: Fortunately we chose to visit on Sunday which was a bargain at €1 per person. This gallery would have to be one of the best in Europe. I think far superior to the George Pompidou and the Musee D'Orsay in Paris. This is a marvelous gallery with so much to see. Highly recommend to

title: Great Modern Art Museum
text: Oops, I thought I was reviewing this museum for my last post but it was for the Museum of Urban and Contemporary Art which we didn’t make it to. The Pinakothek der Modern was the best and we were surprised to find this quality in Munich and not Berlin.

title: Wo bleibt die Gegenwartskunst
text: Der Kurator der Pinakothek der Moderne hat ein anderes Verständnis vom Sammlungszweck eines Museums für Gegenwartskunst als ich. Ausstellungen wie „die neue Heimat“ oder „Schmuckismus“ sind deplatziert. Die neue Heimat produzierte 60er und 70er Jahre Architektur, keine

title: Excellent for modern German/European art
text: This art museum has a large and wide-ranging displayed collection of paintings and some sculpture. The abstract German artists of 1920-30's are well represented and explained, plus works by Picasso and American painters. A ticket at 7 euro includes the 3 museums on the block. Most signs are in English and German; a multilingual audio guide to the galleries is also available.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Sehr interessant
text: Die Pinakothek der Moderne bietet ein sehr breites Spektrum und ist interessant gestaltet. Manche Kunst erklärt sich erst bei längerem betrachten ! Ein bisschen schade ist, daß die Mitarbeiter ab und an gelangweilt an den Wänden lehnen. Trotzdem sehenswert !

title: Amazing building & amazing collection of works.
text: Fortunately we chose to visit on Sunday which was a bargain at €1 per person. This gallery would have to be one of the best in Europe. I think far superior to the George Pompidou and the Musee D'Orsay in Paris. This is a marvelous gallery with so much to see. Highly recommend to all art lovers.

title: Great Modern Art Museum
text: Oops, I thought I was reviewing this museum for my last post but it was for the Museum of Urban and Contemporary Art which we didn’t make it to. The Pinakothek der Modern was the best and we were surprised to find this quality in Munich and not Berlin.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Wo bleibt die Gegenwartskunst
text: Der Kurator der Pinakothek der Moderne hat ein anderes Verständnis vom Sammlungszweck eines Museums für Gegenwartskunst als ich. Ausstellungen wie „die neue Heimat“ oder „Schmuckismus“ sind deplatziert. Die neue Heimat produzierte 60er und 70er Jahre Architektur, keine Gegenwartsarchitektur. Passt schon von der Epochenklassifikation her gesehen nicht in dieses Museum.

title: Eine wirklich gelungene Zusammenstellung einer Sammlung
text: Überraschende Präsentation von Gegenständen, die das Lebenmeiner Generation begleiteten, aber eben auch eindrucksvolle Werke der Bildenden Kunst.

title: Для продвинутых и на любителя.
text: Ходила с дочерью .Она многое мне объясняла , поэтому было легче. Но сложно для тех кто не знает немецкого или хотя бы английского. Айди гидов нет на русском.

title: Interessant
text: Da die neue Pinakothek leider wegen Renovierung geschlossen hatte, habe wir uns die moderne angesehen.Positiv ist der Preis am Sonntag: 1 Euro.Das Gebäude selbst ist sehenswert. Im Keller ausreichend Kästen und Garderoben vorhanden. Die Architekturausstellung war OK,die Ausstellung der Kustwerke war ....,... naja muss jeder selber beurteilen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Unique
text: Modern art is such an open term. This museum has done a great job with incorporating so much. Some very fun to see and some to really make you think. It was nice to wander around and see Dali, Warhol, cars on walls, tiny robots and a spaceship.

title: UNA GRANDE ESPERIENZA
text: Tanta gente (giovani famiglie) all interno di una organizzazione notevole ( dalla biglietteria ai guardaroba) per visitare  oggetti e opere di notevole interesse. Esperienza indimenticabile

title: Amazing pieces
text: This museum is in a fantastically designed building located near the lenbachaus. the front door was a bit hard to find at first, but once you are inside there are so many floors and rooms that are filled to the brim with photography, sculptures, and art that you can spend hours here just looking at everything.

title: Das muss man gesehen haben
text: Ein Besuch den ich so schnell nicht vergessen werde.Ruhe, Kunst, modere, Architektur, können, groß, Licht, wenig ist mehr, Erinnerungen, Kindheit, Erstaunen, Weite, Farben , Ich könnte noch Tage schreiben............. Sehr zu empfehlen!Sonntag sehr ruhig,⭐️⭐️⭐️
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Imposant gebouw met mooi overzicht
text: De entree met hal en lichtkoepel van het gebouw is geweldig, groots, strak en modern.De collectie geeft een goed overzicht van onder andere Duitse schilders zoals Max Ernst, Die Blauwe Reiter en vele anderen.Wij gingen voor de nieuwe aanwinsten, een schenking, van vijf werken van Anselm Kiefer. Prachtig, reden om hier naar toe re gaan.Vergeet niet de tryptiek van Francis Bacon te gaan bekijken. Er is ook een mooi overzicht van de periode Bauhaus met meubels en artikelen uit deze periode.En dan nog een mededeling van huishoudelijke aard: de herentoilet is ook mooi ontworpen maar stinkt. Vrij eenvoudig om dit op te lossen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Eccellente museo
text: La pinacoteca ha una bellissima sezione sul design, con un'ottima selezione di opere del Bauhaus e di autori moderni. Molto interessante anche la raccolta museale sulla pittura del '900, con opere di grande spessore e una buona documentazione, anche per chi non parla tedesco.

title: Another great museum in Munich
text: We didn't visit this museum in our previous visiting of Munich but New Pinakothek was closed and we went to this place. Our experience in modern art are very limited and we aren't fun of it but here we were happy. We've learned and seen a lot of new. We've discovered a new name for ourselves, Kirchner. Of course works of Kandinsky, Braque, Picasso, Dali and Warhol  impressed as usual. We strongly recommends to visit this museum.The visiting this museum in Sunday cost only 1 euro per person.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Arte moderna e contemporanea
text: La Pinakotek der Moderne si trova nella zona dei vari musei di Monaco e si sviluppa su due piani.Le sale di arte contemporanea sono molto belle e particolari perché hanno anche i pavimenti che riprendono i colori delle opere.Tra i quadri di arte moderna troviamo invece tracce di artisti famosi come Magritte, Dalì, De Chirico, Kandinsky e Picasso.Curato e interessante nel complesso, ma mi aspettavo qualcosa di più.La domenica il biglietto d'ingresso costa solo un euro.

title: Great Museum in a Great Building
text: The Pinakothek der moderne museum building is one of the finest architecture in Munich city. The domed rotunda is one of its specialities, the high monochromatic columns supporting the triangular roof on each side of the building created an amazing space  in both the entrance . The collection is also good, the temporary exhibitions from time to time are also good . On sundays you can visit the museum with just one euro ticket. If you have some interest  in modern art and architecture this museum is a must go.

title: The building itself is even more impressive.
text: Good collection of contemporary art, however most impressive is the architecture of the building. For Blaue Reiter do not forget also to visit lehmanhaus.

title: An experience made unpleasant by rude staff
text: I was in Munich for a short time and due to my love of being surprised by thought-provoking and unconventional modern art, I thought it would be an enjoyable way to while away a few hours. Unfortunately I now wish I had opted for the Alta pinakothek (as I also adore the skill and longevity of the old masters). It was deeply unfriendly place, I bounced from one unfriendly and unhelpful face to another, as I tried to establish where to get tickets, what ticket I should buy, where to get the audio guide (you need ID to hand in for this), the fact you cannot take a bag or any item larger than an A4 piece of paper on your person. We eventually established I must put my bag away - it is 1€ to hang your coat / bag up and free to use a locker (you just need a 2€ coin). I think they may believe that art is founded on aloofness, and inaccessibility makes it more desirable. I felt like an unwelcome visitor to the museum. There are places to sit in each gallery / room with an accompanying book for the museum in German. You journey through the ages following the path of modern art Surrealism cubism etc, there is a WW German artist theme and a modern design exhibition on everyday items in the basement. It would be a great day out for an art group or school trip studying one of these themes.

title: Moderne
text: Kunst im modernen Gebäude. Selbst am stark preisreduzierten Sonntag ist ausreichend Platz zum Besichtigen und Bestaunen der hochwertigen Ausstellung.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Modern und manchmal doch wieder nur Bild an Bild
text: Die Sonderausstellung war toll aufbereitet. Die Dauerausstellung war ein bischen langweilig. Man schafft es in vier Stunden und am Ende hat man (ich) keine Lust mehr.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Tanto, una visita non basta
text: Ero già stato al PIN una domenica qualche anno fa, quando abitavo a Monaco. La domenica tra l'altro si paga una quota simbolica, forse 1 euro. Gli altri giorni 10 euro.La parte che mi piace di più è ai livelli in basso, sul design. Molto impressionante e fa riflettere sulla deriva dell'industria italiana negli ultimi decenni.La parte di arte moderna interessante, qualcosa di rivisto se avete visitato altri musei di arte moderna e contemporanea. Comunque è una struttura molto grande e ricca, una sola visita non basta a coprire tutto.

title: Modern and art is in the eyes of the beholder
text: Some of the exhibited "works" , do they quality for the designation as being "art'? You will be the judge. It is worth the detour , but if you have to prioritise I would say that the alte and then Neue takes precedence

title: Immer wieder einen Besuch wert
text: Eigentlich ein MUST SEE, wenn man moderne Kunst mag. Die ausgestellten Künstler findet man auf der Website. Tipp: am Sonntag zahlt man nur 1EUR Eintritt, dafür ist aber auch mehr los.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Ricchezza di capolavori
text: Ottimo centro d'arte che raccoglie quadri, sculture e creazioni di design di arte moderna e contemporanea. Chi ama l'arte non può perdersi una visita qui.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: I Gots 'Dem Ole' Rider Blues!
text: My Honey Bee and me visited the Moderne after exploring the Alte Pinakothek and discovered another fabulous collection of expressionists, minimalists and other mediums which seek to purge war torn souls.  Sculpture, drawings, oils and more; a pair of eerie autopsy gurneys installed with other duos which underscore Beuys' view of the duality of man & the cosmos. What appears to be a pile of "stuff" on a table is, upon observation, found to be a melange' of particular items that illustrate some aspect of war or life as he felt it.  Spend a day or so, pack a lunch or enjoy the cafe'.  Life is brief my friends. ENJOY!

title: Kann man besuchen, muss man aber nicht
text: Beeindruckende Architektur, die eigentlich allein schon einen Besuch rechtfertigen sollte. Die Ausstellungen waren OK, teilweise aber doch etwas kleinteilig und langweilig. Wie es mit der Kunst halt so ist, alles Geschmacksache.Was gar nicht geht ist der Zustand der Toiletten, leider völlig verdreckt gewesen!

title: Magnifique musée d'art moderne
text: Beaucoup de grands maîtres, Picasso, Kandinsky, Klee, Bacon, etc...plus quelques fantaisistes contemporains ( assez rigolos, je dois dire) et un superbe bâtiment, clair, large, aéré ...un vrai plaisir.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Zeer mooi museum voor o.a. Hedendaagse kunst
text: Interessant en groot museum van hedendaagse kunst. Ook prachtige architectuur. Je kunt niet alles in één bezoek zien.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Excellent exhibition of modern art
text: Excellent exhibition of modern works in several artistic domains. Can get very crowded on Sundays, but there's enough space for everyone.

title: Pour les amateurs de l'art contemporain mais aussi de l'architecture et du design
text: La pinakothek des moderns est le dernier en date des musées composant la pinakothek. Dans un bâtiment remarquable, elle offre plusieurs expositions qui multiplient les centres d'intérêt : non seulement l'art moderne et, plus encore, contemporain  (en particulier les peintres allemands : Polke, Kiefer...) mais aussi le design et l'architecture (expo temporaires). Le café peut constituer une étape agréable pour une collation. Belle librairie.

title: Perhaps Munich’s best
text: A cognizance of art and design in the 20th and 21st centuries, and a forum for discussing current trends. These are the objectives of the Moderne and they have achieved them in spades.I rediscovered genuine masterpieces I’d forgotten, found new ones and gained a new perspective on it all in Politics of Design. A euro admission on Sundays makes the Moderne the best bargain in Munich. A small criticism. The security system protecting the artwork seemed to be on the ‘Fritz’. Alarms were constantly sounding from various parts of the gallery on both my visits. The guards seem to blame to visitors for being too close but it’s not that. I watched. It’s something else. Mice?
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bellissima
text: Ricca di capolavori modernissimi tutti sistemati con parsimonia e adeguati, veramente da visitare, anche la stessa struttura non e' da meno alle opere interne.

title: Wonderful exhibitions, overzealous staff
text: The museum and many of the artworks are a delight. The architecture, lighting and design of the building is in its own right worth seeing. The only down point was that some of the staff took an aggressive approach towards visitors regarding what they have in their pockets. There’s always a way of asking people to follow rules they may not have been aware of; a reasonable and polite way, or an over-aggressive and inappropriate way. Sadly the staff chose the latter.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Holy Ground for German Expressionism
text: OMG, the Franz Marc’s here are worth the entrance fee.  But you also have others from der Blaue Reiter and die Bruecke.  This museum is the result of the mortar and pestle of WWI. So glad I went, but my wife would have hated it.

title: 뮌헨 미술관 3대장 중 하나인 현대 미술관
text: 아무래도 알테 피나코텍과 노이에 피나코텍에 비해 유명하지 않아 항상 관람 순위에 밀리게 되는 경향이 있는 것 같습니다. 종교화와 중세 유럽의 그림에 질리신 분들에게 추천합니다. 앤디 워홀 특별전 등 유명한 팝아트 작가들의 전시를 많이 합니다. 근처에 있는 뮌헨  대학교 구경도 할 수 있습니다.

title: 吹き抜けのエントランスと明るく広い展示室
text: 近代美術の展示と企画展で建築設計を見ました。アルテ、ピナコテークとノイエ、ピナコテークを見た後に訪れました。喫茶コーナーで軽く昼食を取った後ゆっくり回りました。建築設計図や建築模型は興味を惹かれました。円形の吹抜けの周りの広く明るい展示室にでピカソ他近代美術を鑑賞する事が出来ました。

title: デザインなどに興味がある方におすすめ！
text: ダリ、クレー、ピカソなどの常設展と企画展がありました。知らずに行ったのですが企画展が建築関係でとても良かったので大満足です。またミュージアムショップにはデザイン関係などの書籍やアイテムなどが豊富でした。また併設カフェもリーズナブルで美味しいのでお勧めです(入場エリアとは別なのでチケットなしでもカフェは利用できます。フレッシュジュースとケーキで６€くらいだったとおもいます)

title: Μοντέρνο
text: Αξίζει να επισκεφτεί  κάποιος την Πινακοθήκη αυτή η οποία βρίσκεται στην περιοχή  με τις άλλες πινακοθήκες του Μονάχου.Έχει ωραίο shop.

title: Наверное, каждый мечтает здесь побывать
text: В Мюнхене есть две Пинакотеки. В одной сосредоточены картины старых мастеров, в другой - современное искусство. Там сосредоточены прекрасные коллекции живописи, например, в старой Пинакотеке есть первый в мире натюрморт, часто организовываются выставки. Билеты можно купить

title: 뮌헨 미술관 3대장 중 하나인 현대 미술관
text: 아무래도 알테 피나코텍과 노이에 피나코텍에 비해 유명하지 않아 항상 관람 순위에 밀리게 되는 경향이 있는 것 같습니다. 종교화와 중세 유럽의 그림에 질리신 분들에게 추천합니다. 앤디 워홀 특별전 등 유명한 팝아트 작가들의 전시를 많이 합니다. 근처에 있는 뮌헨  대학교 구경도 할 수 있습니다.

title: 吹き抜けのエントランスと明るく広い展示室
text: 近代美術の展示と企画展で建築設計を見ました。アルテ、ピナコテークとノイエ、ピナコテークを見た後に訪れました。喫茶コーナーで軽く昼食を取った後ゆっくり回りました。建築設計図や建築模型は興味を惹かれました。円形の吹抜けの周りの広く明るい展示室にでピカソ他近代美術を鑑賞する事が出来ました。

title: デザインなどに興味がある方におすすめ！
text: ダリ、クレー、ピカソなどの常設展と企画展がありました。知らずに行ったのですが企画展が建築関係でとても良かったので大満足です。またミュージアムショップにはデザイン関係などの書籍やアイテムなどが豊富でした。また併設カフェもリーズナブルで美味しいのでお勧めです(入場エリアとは別なのでチケットなしでもカフェは利用できます。フレッシュジュースとケーキで６€くらいだったとおもいます)

title: Μοντέρνο
text: Αξίζει να επισκεφτεί  κάποιος την Πινακοθήκη αυτή η οποία βρίσκεται στην περιοχή  με τις άλλες πινακοθήκες του Μονάχου.Έχει ωραίο shop.

title: Наверное, каждый мечтает здесь побывать
text: В Мюнхене есть две Пинакотеки. В одной сосредоточены картины старых мастеров, в другой - современное искусство. Там сосредоточены прекрасные коллекции живописи, например, в старой Пинакотеке есть первый в мире натюрморт, часто организовываются выставки. Билеты можно купить непосредственно в Пинакотеке, хоть очередь и собирается, но двигается довольно быстро. Возьмите аудио гида, а лучше всего, конечно, походить с опытным экскурсоводом. Но даже без дополнительных "опций" будет очень интересно! Имейте в виду, что Пинакотека современного искусства включает в себя искусство, начиная с 20 века, так что это далеко не только абстракция и инсталляции

title: Großartige Kunst (am Sonntag für 1€)
text: In dem großartigen Bauwerk sind Gemälde, Skulpturen und Design ausgestellt. Alle Kunstwerke haben genügend Platz, um entsprechend zu wirken. Wir waren am Sonntag morgen da. Man könnte ganz entspannt durch die verschiedenen Ausstellungen gehen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Impressive architecture, great collection
text: Entry is only 1 euro on Sundays!The main collection is not big but very nicely displayed and highly interesting, I loved wandering around the museum.

title: Tolle Sammlung, leider sehr voll und laut
text: Gegen die Sammlung kann man nichts sagen, diese ist hervorragend. Besonders der Francis Bacon hat mich sehr gefreut. Leider ist das Museum überfüllt und daher ist es schwierig abzuschalten und die Kunst zu genießen.

title: Bellissimo
text: Veramente un tuffo tra i capolavori che hanno segnato l'arte moderna rivoluzionandola in uno spazio espositivo bellissimo dove ogni opera ha la sua collocazione in maniera perfetta ed adeguata.

title: Ruined by Over Zealous Guards
text: As we reading a small description of what we were looking at, a stern female guard came over and told us to move away from the print! It was a print of a photograph, not a classic work of art, no value at all.We stood our ground and explained to her, that she  needed to be more respectful to guests who visit the museum. We also made a formal compliant with the director. Why do the staff try and make you feel uncomfortable in looking at the works of art or exhibits.It's a shame as it was beautiful building to visit. The best bit was the cafe, they know about customer service.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple
